Welcome to PhytoplanktonAirSystems A smart monitoring app developed by Algaerithms‑Inc. These Terms govern your use of the app and its features.
1. Eligibility You must be at least 13 years old to use this app. By accessing the app, you agree to abide by these Terms of Service.
2. Usage Guidelines You agree to use the app only for lawful, non-commercial purposes. You must not:
Misuse or interfere with the app’s functionality
Reverse engineer or attempt to access restricted parts of the system
3. User Responsibilities You are responsible for the information you provide, including:
Profile details
System configuration
Do not:
Impersonate others
Provide false or misleading information
4. Ownership All content, features, branding, and code within the app are the intellectual property of Algaerithms‑Inc. They may not be copied, modified, or reused without express permission.
5. Termination We may suspend or restrict your access if these terms are violated. You may delete your account and data anytime using the “Delete Account” option in the app settings.
6. Modifications We may update these Terms periodically. Continued use of the app after changes means you accept the updated Terms.
7. Disclaimer The app is provided “as is”. We do not guarantee:
Uninterrupted performance
Data accuracy
Absence of minor bugs or limitations

PhytoplanktonAirSystems values your privacy. This policy describes the types of data we collect, how it's used, and how it's stored.

 1. Information We Collect
 • Profile data: name, birthdate, email, phone number
 • App preferences: dark mode, screen lock, accessibility filters
 • Sensor data: CO₂ levels, light exposure, algae status, water level
 • Diagnostic data: crash logs and usage (if enabled)

 2. How We Use Your Data
 • To operate and improve app features
 • To notify you of air system conditions and alerts
 • To retain your personalized settings and usage context
 • To monitor performance and resolve technical issues

 3. Data Storage and Processing
 • Data is stored locally on your device using secure Android storage mechanisms
 • Some features use Firebase (by Google) for secure authentication, cloud storage, and diagnostics

 4. Data Sharing
 We do not sell or share your personal information with third-party companies. Data stored through Firebase is used strictly for app-related functionality.

 5. User Control
 You can manage your profile and preferences within the app. You may delete all stored data using the “Delete Account” feature in Settings.

 6. Policy Updates
 We may update this Privacy Policy as needed. All changes will be reflected within the app for your review.
Deleting your account will erase all data stored in this app, including profile information, preferences, and usage history.
This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
